testcase.classname: Wants Latte/There is no milk/Request Latte
testcase.name: Should see no milk warning

testcase.classname: Wants Latte/There is no milk/Give up/Walk away from the coffee machine
testcase.name: Should be able to walk away from the coffee machine

testcase.classname: Wants Latte/There is no milk/Wants Espresso instead/Request Espresso
testcase.name: Should see espresso choice

testcase.classname: Wants Latte/There is no milk/Wants Espresso instead/Wants single shot/Request single shot
testcase.name: Should get single shot Espresso

testcase.classname: Wants Latte/There is no milk/Wants Espresso instead/Wants double shot/Request double shot
testcase.name: Should get double shot Espresso

testcase.classname: Wants Cappuccino/There is no milk/Request Cappuccino
testcase.name: Should see no milk warning

testcase.classname: Wants Cappuccino/There is no milk/Request Espresso instead/Request Espresso
testcase.name: Should see espresso choice

testcase.classname: Wants Cappuccino/There is no milk/Request Espresso instead/Wants single shot/Request single shot
testcase.name: Should get single shot Espresso

testcase.classname: Wants Cappuccino/There is no milk/Request Espresso instead/Wants double shot/Request double shot
testcase.name: Should get double shot Espresso

testcase.classname: Wants Espresso/Wants single shot/Request single shot
testcase.name: Should get single shot Espresso

testcase.classname: Wants Espresso/Wants double shot/Request double shot
testcase.name: Should get double shot Espresso
